index.what: Welcome to the wizardry website. Here you can find info about me - Ivanischev Fyodor - and the links to my experiments. Feel free to browse!
index.title: Index - cbrwizard.com - Fyodor Ivanishchev

meta.description: Main page of a magical website.

about.what: Okie-dokie, from a professional point of view I am a software developer and I write code in Javascript and Ruby. I enjoy doing it and sometimes I even manage to write something I'm not ashamed of [: I was born in Saint-Petersburg, Russia, and now I travel around the world, working remotely. Previously I have launched a couple of small startups. All the time I learn and try something new: Unity and game development being are on my radar right now. But enough talking - here are the proofs!
